quizzes.description: Climate change is drastically changing our world, but how much are we contributing to it?

quizzes.name: Dogs
quizzes.description: Man's best friend, but there are so many things that make dogs special from other animals. Learn some fun facts about dogs in this quiz.

quizzes.description: Everybody is on the internet. Most folks have social media, but how does technology change us?
